settings.title: Same Day in Store Pickup
settings.text:
Order online by 3pm for same day* in store pickup, prior to store closing hours. Orders placed after 3pm will be available for pickup the next day*.Order online by 3pm for same day* in store pickup, prior to store closing hours. settings.text:

settings.title: Ship to Store (Pickup)
settings.text:
Want to pickup your order at your selected store, but the store doesn't have the items on-hand? Then use our 'Ship to Store' service to have your order shipped from our distribution center to your selected store and pick it up in 5-7 business day.Want to pickup your order at your selected store, but the store doesn't have the items on-hand? Then use our 'Ship to Store' service to have your order shipped from our distribution center to your selected store and pick it up in 5-7 business day.

settings.title: Home Delivery
settings.text:
Free home delivery is available for all orders, with our standard 5-7 business day* shipping.Free home delivery is available for all orders, with our standard 5-7 business day* shipping.Free home delivery is available for all orders, with our standard 5-7 business day* shipping.

settings.title: Expedited Home Delivery
settings.text:
If you want home delivery, but you want it faster than our standard 5-7 business day shipping, we offer two expedited shipping options.If you want home delivery, but you want it faster than our standard 5-7 business day shipping, we offer two expedited shipping options.If you want home delivery, but you want it faster than our standard 5-7 business day shipping, we offer two expedited shipping options.

settings.title: Shop in Store
settings.text:
With nearly 500 stores across the country, including our Outlets, there's likely a Vans store near you. Come and meet our amazing team of brand ambassadors!
